attributes.review: Worst app ever. This app made me not want to eat another Cheeto Puff ever again. If you like Cheeto Puffs please DO NOT GET THIS APP. This app literally stole my car. I woke up and my car was gone 😔 it just had to be this app.. it’s the only conclusion that makes sense to me. I mean who else would steal my car. I just wanted to support this poor lost Oompa Loompa. But there’s no helping him :( he’s Evil and the worst pedo- sorry I meant president ever. Please give me back my car...
attributes.title: Disgusting 🤮

attributes.review: As soon as I opened it my phone went to full volume without my control and kept playing “grab her by the p**sy” over and over in trumps voice traumatized I tried closing the app but my phone was frozen on it so I tried shutting it down then a Cheeto hand came out of my phone and tried to grab me in my lady bits 0/10 would not recommend this app to anyone
attributes.title: Most inappropriate app I’ve ever downloaded 🤢

attributes.review: I downloaded it just to open it and there was a white screen for 2 days. When it finally opened I found that this app has no use. Completely useless. I decided to give it a chance and the longer I had it, it would glitch my phone even worse. I went to the phone store and they said I got a bad “virus or bug” from apps like this. Don’t download it
attributes.title: Glitches

attributes.review: Honestly I don’t even know what to do on the app like I have no idea! And I think this is so unnecessary and we really don’t need it. This is officially my least favorite app! I’m sorry if I made you sad but I really don’t need this up and I really don’t like it sorry to the people who like it but I do not love it and it’s super horrible. I hope you agree with me but if you don’t that’s fine because we all have opinions.
attributes.title: NO

attributes.review: i downloaded this app in hopes of learning why everyone is in love with this cheeto. but instead the second the app installed my phone smelt horrendous. i tried everything to get rid of the smell. perfume, febreeze, bleach, I EVEN TRIED THE WASHING MACHINE. but nothing. my phone continued to carry this pungent odor. it smelt like a mix of wet dog with some sort of rotten fruit🤢 in addition to this everytime i clicked on the app my sister started levitating🙄 this app is a very much no❤️
attributes.title: MAKES YOUR PHONE SMELL WEIRD

attributes.review: I need therapy after this. You want this Cheeto man to be your next president. I’d rather have a PIG as my president, although that wouldn’t be much of a difference, if you spray paint the pig orange it’d look the same as trump. Oh and don’t forget the toupee on its head. Would definitely give less than a one star ⭐️ if I could. 👁👄👁. Just💫don’t🍎get🚙it🐒. Unless💨you 💩want🥦to🧚🏼projectile❤️vomit 🤢. Three emojis to describe trump: 🤢🐷🤡. And that is all I have to say😌.
attributes.title: DISGUSTANGGGG!!!! DON’T GET IT!! 🤢🤮

attributes.review: cheeto puff trumps app just very sucky would not recommend the more you use it the oranger you get, until you end up like him and soon you’ll be thrown in a cheeto chip bag but you’ll be the soggy chip at the bottom that no one wants to eat so he’s very unsatisfactory very, very nasty app
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP WOULD NOT RECCOMEND

attributes.review: I got this app not expecting much sense it was made by a rapist ,homophobic ,pedifile but when It finally downloaded i was surprised to see an ugly Cheeto. I decided to keep on looking at it and the things I saw where awful I now have to go to therapy to cope with the scary awful things I had to see on this app I strongly suggest to never allow children to see this app cause they may grow up to be j as awful and inconsiderate as the bunker boy.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: Honestly this is the worst app ever created, it took me an entire 20 hours in order to download this app, while that was happening I experienced a death in family, so I would say this app causes death. It also takes up way too much  storage space on my phone, (to the creators) have you ever thought about minimizing the app size and/or getting rid of the app all together? Just an idea.
attributes.title: no bueno

attributes.review: This is the worst app ever!! As soon as i got it, it started to make my whole phone lag and glitch really bad, and when i finally decided to open the app it shut down completely. I didn’t even get to the first page because the lag and glitch was so bad 🤮 i will never ever use this app again. if i could i would rate this app a 0/10 would not recommend!! 👹💩
attributes.title: worst app
